name: Just A Fps... (REMAKE)
description:
Just A Fps... Was Removed from Itch.io Because I lost the Game Files to make a Patch.

But I finally found the files.

And Just A Fps... IS REBORN!

(SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS)

Minimal: RAM: 4 Gigabytes CPU: At Least 3.0 Gigahertz GPU: At least 4 Gigabyte of VideoRam OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
